_aChangeLog.text: Stage3/6 : removed contact damage from ifrit boss
Item : added 10 new items for human
Items : every human item have own tier number, spawn chance is depends on tier number
Item : increased amount of human item to spawn (7 -> 8)
Item : slower sphere item got changed its name to "antidoter", slow effect is weaker, sets zombies hp to 3000
Item : push item got changed its name to "pulse field", changed particle effect
Item : toxic launcher got changed its name to "freeze grenade launcher", shoots projectile that spread freeze gas
Item : zombie heal item cooldown sets depends on difficulty (90sec on normal mode, 30sec on hell mode)
Item : rainbow beam, slower sphere (antidoter), push (pulse field) and ammo are no longer guaranteed to spawn
Stage3 : rotating bar part is reworked
Stage4 : removed tank boss, added new boss instead
Stage6 : nerfed ifrit boss a bit
stage 4/5 : in the multiple route part, zombies can break the door instantly by touching it

_sText:
Secret Stage is now on hold

Map Information

- 6 Stages (3 Normal Mode & 3 Hell Mode)
- 21items for human
- 2items for zombie
- Bossfights
- Color correction
- NPC

Spawn chance is depends on tier number
Heal item is always guaranteed to spawn
